page.title: 16Local children's games
page.content: {GAMES OF PAIN: {Slaps:}hitting back of hand| causing & {Flicks:}flicking thumbnail | bearing {Knuckles:}hitting knuckles | pain {Peanuts:}interlocking fingers; bending back until submission {Red Mini:}2 teams, taking it in turn to break through other team {GAMES OF SKILL: {Eggy Peggy:}series of jumps over and onto elastic loop {Kings and Queens:}throwing stones at target numbers, hopping {Hopping Tom:}balancing, hopping contest between individuals {Kerbies:}throw ball to hit opposite kerb {WORD GAMES: {Fishes:}reacting to verbal comments e.g. "The sea is rough" {Chinese Whispers:}passing whispered messages which become deformed
